stimulusHtml: The author of an e-book publishes the e-book using a no-rights-reserved Creative Commons license. Which of the following best explains the consequences of publishing the book with this type of license?
choicesHtml: The contents of the e-book will be encrypted and can only be decrypted by authorized individuals.
Individuals can freely distribute or use the contents of the e-book without needing to obtain additional permissions from the author.
Individuals will be legally prevented from sharing the e-book on a peer-to-peer network.
Individuals will be legally prevented from using excerpts from the e-book in another published work.
